item.title: Writing a "Blog"
item.description: Last edited [2022-06-23 Thu] Note: This blog will mostly likely ever changes as I form my preference of what I think a good blog should be. Blog. Piece. Article. Whatever you called it doesn’t matter. I will redefine it here. For the rest of the blog, I will use the word blog. I define blog as followed Blog is a collection of text with a goal’s guided narrative.
